title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 47.3 - Tabulation of capitalization proceedings to be filed
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 47.3 - Tabulation of capitalization proceedings to be filed

State Regulations

The petitioner shall also file with its application a
tabulation of proceedings before the Public Service Commission, or its
predecessors, in which authorization of capital stock was petitioned for, showing for each such proceeding: (a) class of stock; (b) number of
shares petitioned for; (c) number
of shares and par value thereof authorized, or if nonpar stock, the estimated
selling price; (d) number of shares
sold and proceeds realized; (e) number of shares for which authorization was canceled prior to issue; and
(f) number of unissued shares
covered by unexercised authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
47.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
